polygon.style: stroke: rgb(0,0,0); stroke-width: 0; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: rgb(20,10,10); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

circle.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: url(#SVGID_4); fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
